Bond [i]({T}: Until end of turn, target nonbonded creature adds this creature’s base power and toughness to its own, gains the following ability, and becomes bonded. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Double strike
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may gain 2 life. If you don’t, draw a card and lose 1 life.
notes: 2.2.1: Fully changed. Now just changes your life by either gaining life or losing life to draw cards on combat damage. Also given double strike both to make the choices more varied and to give this card some kick.
